Posts.Content: WelshGirl, I don't know much about this, but I do know that if you have the problem on both sides, its prob not cancer. It is kind of rare to have it in both breasts. As for the puckering/dimpling, it looks like the skin of an orange, as if the pores of the breast are greatly enlarged. I would try to see a breast surgeon instead of a gyno or GP. A breast surgeon can give you a diagnosis and reassurance as well. Take care, S
Posts.Title: Warm, Tender breasts

Posts.Content: Thats good, its no fun having any kind of health concern hanging over you. Good luck to you ,take care. SH
